contexts.context: ...consuluerimus et providerimus, quantum calamitatis, confusionis et <mark>tumultus</mark> in universa christiana republica, potissimum vero in Germania...
...nisi modo a perturbata proscissaque sinceritate fidei catholicẹ ad <mark>tumultus</mark> seditionesque excitandas animum convertissent, quẹ in capita maxime...
